src_original: daṇḍavarggaḥ śaraṇa bahū ve śaraṇaṃ yānti parvvate ca vanāni ca / vastūni rukkhacittāṇi manuṣyā bhayatajjitā //
bahavaḥ śaraṇaṃ yānti parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca / ārāmāṃ vṛkṣacaityāṃś ca manuṣyā bhayatarjitāḥ //
na etaṃ śaraṇaṃ khemmaṃ na etaṃ śaraṇaṃ uttamaṃ /
yo tu buddhañ ca dhammañ ca saghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gato /
